revised_title: Influence of Training and Age on the Speed of Voluntary Muscular Movements
tldr: This study investigates the impact of training and age on the speed of voluntary muscular movements, focusing on finger movements, pen movements, and writing. The results show that the velocity of movements decreases as they become more complex, and the difference between educated and uneducated individuals is more noticeable in more complex movements. Additionally, the study finds that the velocity of movements decreases with age, with the most significant impact observed in writing.
